title: Apache Teaclave (incubating)
description: Apache Teaclave (incubating) is an open source universal secure computing platform, making computation on privacy-sensitive data safe and simple.

items.title: Mitigation of Intel-SA-00219 in Teaclave SGX SDK
items.summary: This article is to help people understand Intel-SA-00219, and how Teaclave SGX SDK handles it.

items.title: Announcing Apache Teaclave (incubating) 0.1.0
items.summary:

  Teaclave SGX SDK can also be used separately to write standalone SGX enclaves

items.title: Teaclave 安全计算开源生态 - 由 Teaclave 驱动的开源项目一览
items.summary: Teaclave 生态也支持着可信计算和系统安全相关的学术研究，其中包括可信执行环境的安全，内存安全的 SGX SDK 设计，SGX 第三方库生态的安全等等相关课题。其中有多篇学术成果发表在国际顶级会议上。

items.title: The Teaclave Secure Computing Ecosystem - Projects Powered by Teaclave
Podling Teaclave Report - January 2021
items.summary:
Improve project structure and documentation
  Grow the community (attracting more committers, contributors, users)
  Publish more Apache releases

items.title: Roadmap in 2021: Project Maturity and Community Buildup
items.summary:
better engineering. New features and enhancements was implemented and well
tested. Also we wrote plenty of documents for the design, implementation, as
well as the code base. Furthermore, the homepage
of Apache Teaclave (incubating) was built and online, which contains many
useful information on the project and community. We also organized several
offline meetups to build up and grow the Teaclave family. In addition, for
better explaining the project, we introduced the blog in the Teaclave homepage
and then published an article about the ecosystem.
In this article, we spent some time to summarize existing open source projects
powered by Teaclave. Last but not least, we also attended SGX Workshop and
ApacheCon to introduce our project. Overall we're very glad to see the
development of the project and growth of the community.
